title: New projects proposed to be implemented from the year 2018 for the Development of the Plantation Sector
decision_details: •- The proposal made by Hon. Navin Dissanayake, the Minister of Plantation Industries, to obtain funds amounting to a sum of Rs.730 million from the General Treasury for the implementation of 10 projects proposed, commencing from the year 2018 for the enhancement of the performance of the plantation sector by the Rubber Research Institute, Coconut Cultivation Board, National Plantation Management Institute and the 'Thurusaviya' Fund which are functioning under the purview of the Ministry of Plantation Industries, was approved by the Cabinet.
